item.title: Is the Bill Maher / UC Berkeley Fiasco Really a Free Speech Issue, Or a Power Struggle?
item.description: David Frum has an intriguing post in The Atlantic dealing with the Bill Maher / UC Berkeley fiasco. Here are a couple of the choice paragraphs:
